alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 07 at 5:20PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The Taiya River near Areas Along Low Lying Portions Of The Chilkoot Trail. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM AKDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 519 PM AKDT, satellite estimates and rain gauge data indicate heavy rain across the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly, especially near the Taiya River. Between 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.75 inches are possible. - For Taiya River near Skagway: At 4:00pm the stage was 16.42 feet. Flood Stage is 16.5 feet. Forecast: A crest just under 17 feet is expected late Saturday evening.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
